00112             function                set_add_limitations( $theAddLimitation )
00113             {
00114                   try
00115                   {
00116                         if( $this->AddLimitations === '1 = 1' )
00117                         {
00118                               $this->AddLimitations = $theAddLimitation;
00119                         }
00120                         else
00121                         {
00122                               throw( new Exception( '"AddLimitations" was already set' ) );
00123                         }
00124                   }

00153             function                unsafe_select( $Condition )
00154             {
00155                   try
00156                   {
00157                         $this->Database->query_as( DB_OBJECT );
00158                         
00159                         $Records = $this->Database->select( 
00160                               '*' , $this->NativeTable , "( $this->AddLimitations ) AND $Condition"
00161                         );
00162                         
00163                         foreach( $Records as $k => $v )
00164                         {
00165                               $Records[ $k ]->title = htmlspecialchars_decode( $Records[ $k ]->title , ENT_QUOTES );
00166                               $Records[ $k ]->comment = htmlspecialchars_decode( $Records[ $k ]->comment , ENT_QUOTES );
00167                         }
00168                         
00169                         return( $Records );
00170                   }
00171                   catch( Exception $e )
00172                   {
00173                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00174                   }
00175             }

00199             function                get_group_by_name( $Group )
00200             {
00201                   try
00202                   {
00203                         $Group = $this->Security->get( $Group , 'command' );
00204                         
00205                         $Items = $this->unsafe_select( "( $this->AddLimitations ) AND title LIKE '$Group'" );
00206                         
00207                         if( count( $Items ) == 0 )
00208                         {
00209                               throw( new Exception( "Group $Group was not found" ) );
00210                         }
00211                         
00212                         return( $Items[ 0 ] );
00213                   }

00337             {
00338                   try
00339                   {
00340                         $Record = $this->Security->parse_parameters( $Record , 'title:command;comment:string' );
00341                         
00342                         list( $Fields , $Values ) = $this->DatabaseAlgorithms->compile_fields_values( $Record );
00343 
00344                         $id = $this->DatabaseAlgorithms->create( $this->NativeTable , $Fields , $Values );
00345 
00346                         return( $id );

00448             function                update( $id , $Record )
00449             {
00450                   try
00451                   {
00452                         $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer_list' );
00453                         $Record = $this->Security->parse_parameters( 
00454                               $Record , 'title:command;comment:string' , 'allow_not_set'
00455                         );
00456                         
00457                         list( $Fields , $Values ) = $this->DatabaseAlgorithms->compile_fields_values( $Record );
00458                         
00459                         if( isset( $Fields[ 0 ] ) )
00460                         {
00461                               $this->Database->update( 
00462                                     $this->NativeTable , $Fields , $Values , "( $this->AddLimitations ) AND id IN ( $id )"
00463                               );
00464                               $this->Database->commit();
00465                         }
00466                   }
00467                   catch( Exception $e )
00468                   {
00469                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

00503             function                get_groups_for_object( $Object , $ObjectType = 'user' )
00504             {
00505                   try
00506                   {
00507                         $Object = $this->Security->get( $Object , 'integer' );
00508                         $LinkType = $this->Link->get_link_type( $ObjectType , 'group' );
00509                         
00510                         $Items = $this->Database->select( 
00511                               'title' , $this->NativeTable.' , umx_link' , 
00512                               "( $this->AddLimitations ) AND ".$this->NativeTable.
00513                                     ".id = umx_link.object2_id AND umx_link.object1_id = $Object AND type = $LinkType"
00514                         );
00515                         
00516                         $Content = array();
00517                         if( count( $Items ) > 0 )
00518                         {
00519                               foreach( $Items as $i )
00520                               {
00521                                     $Content [] = $i->title;
00522                               }
00523                               
00524                               $Content = array_unique( $Content );
00525                         }
00526                         
00527                         return( $Content );
00528                   }
00529                   catch( Exception $e )
00530                   {
00531                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00532                   }
00533             }

00561             function                add_group_for_object( $Group , $Object , $ObjectType = 'user' )
00562             {
00563                   try
00564                   {
00565                         $Group = $this->Security->get( $Group , 'command' );
00566                         $Object = $this->Security->get( $Object , 'string' );
00567                         $ObjectType = $this->Security->get( $ObjectType , 'command' );
00568 
00569                         $Group = $this->unsafe_select( "( $this->AddLimitations ) AND title LIKE '$Group'" );
00570                         if( isset( $Group[ 0 ] ) )
00571                         {
00572                               $Group = $Group[ 0 ];
00573                               $this->Link->create_link( $Object , get_field( $Group , 'id' ) , $ObjectType , 'group' , true );
00574                         }
00575                         else
00576                         {
00577                               throw( new Exception( "Group \"$Group\" was not found" ) );
00578                         }
00579                   }
00580                   catch( Exception $e )
00581                   {
00582                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00583                   }
00584             }

00612             function                delete_group_for_object( $Group , $Object , $ObjectType = 'user' )
00613             {
00614                   try
00615                   {
00616                         $Object = $this->Security->get( $Object , 'string' );
00617                         $ObjectType = $this->Security->get( $ObjectType , 'command' );
00618                         
00619                         if( $Group === false )
00620                         {
00621                               $this->Link->delete_link( $Object , false , $ObjectType , 'group' , true );
00622                         }
00623                         else
00624                         {
00625                               $Group = $this->Security->get( $Group , 'command' );
00626                               $Group = $this->unsafe_select( "( $this->AddLimitations ) AND title LIKE '$Group'" );
00627                               if( isset( $Group[ 0 ] ) )
00628                               {
00629                                     $this->Link->delete_link( 
00630                                           $Object , get_field( $Group[ 0 ] , 'id' ) , $ObjectType , 'group' , true
00631                                     );
00632                               }
00633                         }
00634                   }
00635                   catch( Exception $e )
00636                   {
00637                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00638                   }
00639             }

00667             function                toggle_group_for_object( $Group , $Object , $ObjectType = 'page' )
00668             {
00669                   try
00670                   {
00671                         $this->PermitsCache = array();
00672                   
00673                         $Group = $this->Security->get( $Group , 'command' );
00674                         $Group = $this->unsafe_select( "title LIKE '$Group'" );
00675                         if( isset( $Group[ 0 ] ) === false )
00676                         {
00677                               throw( new Exception( "Group \"$Group\" was not found" ) );
00678                         }
00679                         
00680                         $Group = $Group[ 0 ];
00681                         $Object = $this->Security->get( $Object , 'string' );
00682                         $ObjectType = $this->Security->get( $ObjectType , 'command' );
00683                         
00684                         if( $this->Link->link_exists( $Object , get_field( $Group , 'id' ) , $ObjectType , 'group' ) )
00685                         {
00686                               $this->Link->delete_link( $Object , get_field( $Group , 'id' ) , $ObjectType , 'group' );
00687                         }
00688                         else
00689                         {
00690                               $this->Link->create_link( $Object , get_field( $Group , 'id' ) , $ObjectType , 'group' , true );
00691                         }
00692                   }
00693                   catch( Exception $e )
00694                   {
00695                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00696                   }
00697             }
00698       }
